resources.string: <yes>I know I’m going to win this <bugComp>.
I had a dream about it.
<no>I wouldn’t even try to win, <PlayerName>.
Welcome to Threadspace. How can I help you?
Order from Catalogue
I want to chat.
I'm fine.
Sure!
Please take a look around!
<shy>I had a dream you got me this for my <birthday>!
<glee>Thank you very much, <PlayerName>.
Thank you very much, <PlayerName>!
<yes>I’ll put in a good word for your help.
Oh, I found this, y’know.
You can take it because you helped me out!
I don’t think <NPCName> can see much beyond the here and now.
She’s all on the surface, y’know?
I love the music in <NPCName> shop.
You hear it, right?
<no><NPCName> doesn’t...
<yes>I really dig <NPCName>'s vibe.
<no>There's no WAY I could pull off wearing goggles...
<shy>Believe me, I tried!
<NPCName> doesn’t say too much...
I guess he’s a little bit like you, right <PlayerName>?
I can see amazing things for <NPCName>.
<thinking>Her path is so long… and she’s only halfway through it.
<NPCName> really connects with his animals, spiritually.
They must harmonise, y’know?
<NPCName> is a nice guy and all…
<no>But he’s got no zazz. No zip.
There’s just, nothing FUN about him, y’know?
<NPCName> has a huge dark cloud hanging over him at all times…
It’s terrifying.
I’m kinda into it, y’know?
Hey there, I’m <myName>.
Pleasure to meet you, <PlayerName>. <thinking>I feel like we’ve met each other before?
No? Maybe it was in a past life or something.
I became a <Nomad> a while back I just had to get out of <SouthCity>, y’know?
<shy>So now I travel around selling the clothes I like to make.
<glee>If you see anything you like, please let me know.
Or just drop by whenever, y'know?
Isn’t today amazing?
I mean, I knew it would be.
I’m never wrong about that sort of stuff, y’know?
Hey, <PlayerName>.
Happy <IslandDay>.
<NPCName> is putting on a <SnagSizzle> for us all.
<yes>She’s been excited about this for weeks now, y’know?
<thinking>I had a dream that I saw the sky like this once.
<yes>It was last night.
<glee>It’s so pretty, y’know?
<yes>This <Snag> is so good, y’know?
<thinking>The taste reminds me of something I can’t quite put my finger on…
<shocked>OH!
<glee>That’s it!
<yes>My <Snag> tastes a bit like metal!
<glee>It’s so yummy!
Has anyone told you that you have a really nice aura about you?
<yes>It just feels like you’re a trustworthy person, y’know?
I have it on good authority that today is going to be a good day.
<yes>Trust me, this source is very reliable when it comes to predictions of the future.
<thinking>That is if I did the sacrifice correctly...
<favouriteFood> are full of powerful energy.
If possible, I like to start my day with a <favouriteFood>.
That way, a little bit of that power gets passed onto me, y’know?
<IslandName> is an incredible place, y’know?
The whole island is full of life and energy.
It’s on a whole other level compared to <SouthCity>.
That place was full of people, but absolutely lifeless in a weird way...
<proud>Looking great is the first step towards feeling great.
<shy>I mean, there’s a lot of other steps too, but once you look good on the outside, you will start feeling good on the outside, y’know?
<thinking> If you wear the same colours as somebody, and you can really connect.
It’s like you start humming in the same universal tune, y'know?
<shy>That’s why I try to wear black a lot. I want to try and hum my own tune sometimes.
<thinking>I was watching you sleep the other night and you were tossing and turning a lot, y’know?
Are you feeling okay today, <PlayerName>?
Did you know that the colours red and yellow can actually make you hungry?
<thinking>On the flip side, blue can calm those munchies down a little.
How crazy is that?
<glee>Everything is connected, y’know?
Do you think the people in <SouthCity> have such stale auras has something to do with <BlobFish>?
Maybe those critters are secretly evil?
Y’know, maybe they suck the colour from your aura and make it all dull and grey?
Do you think <animalName> have soft fur?
Try and pat one
I bet it is!
I bet their fur is spiky.
<haha>I don’t think so!
I like my hair not on fire, thank you very much!
<thinking>Y’know, I think you’re right.
<yes>That’s why they act all fierce and scary.
<haha>But deep down I bet they are big softies.
<yes>It probably is, y’know.
<thinking>I mean, their teeth are spiky so maybe their personality is the same!
Hey, <PlayerName>.
<shy>Have I ever told you I like to practice magic during the night sometimes.
<shy>Oh, don’t worry, I’m not messing with anything I can’t control.
<worried>At least…
<worried>I don’t think I am?
I’ve been hearing a strange voice outside my window at night.
It was a little creepy at first, y’know?
<yes>But the more I hear it, the less strange it’s becoming.
<thinking>I was thinking, what if you could make clothes so light you could float in them?
Do you think that’s possible?
<glee>Imagine soaring above the clouds so high that everybody got a chance to check out your threads.
<thinking>You always take some time in your day to come and talk to me.
<yes>I really appreciate that, y’know.
<glee>So, thanks!
<IslandName> is full of some great people.
<no>They don’t all have aura’s as strong as ours, <PlayerName>.
<yes>But they are good people all the same.
Words are very powerful, y’know?
<yes>If you say something to yourself enough, you can make it true.
<thinking>It’s kind of like a magic spell if you think about it.
<thinking>I remember when I made a red T-Shirt and wore it around <SouthCity>.
It was just a regular, red T-shirt, y’know?
<no>But people wouldn’t stop staring at me.
<haha>It was like I had cast a spell on them!
Do you think I could borrow some of your hair, <PlayerName>?
I need it for something..
<shy>Oh don’t worry too much about why!
I’ve got a contract I need to keep.
<haha>Oh, no, it's nothing to do with <Dinks>.
I’ve never met anyone who’s like you, <PlayerName>.
Everytime I talk to you, I feel like you’ve just given me a bit of your energy, y’know?
<thinking>It kinda feels like that if you aren’t around, I don’t know what to do.
<shy>Does that make sense?
<IslandName> is putting a very powerful feeling into the world today.
I can just feel it y’know?
<glee>Something good is going to happen for sure.
<shocked>Woah!
<worried>Did you just feel that?
<yes>I totally just felt the whole atmosphere around me change, y’know?
<yes>I’m not a huge fan of fashion, but I am a big fan of making things.
I like to think my clothes will live on longer than me, y’know?
<yes>Hopefully, they passed down generation to generation.
<glee>Imagine the stories they will tell!
<yes>The <itemName> on <IslandName> are really something.
They really help me actualise, y’know?
I tried to make some clothes out of those <itemName> lying around <IslandName>.
<glee>In my head, it sounded awesome. All SPARKLY and SHARP!
But I just couldn’t bring myself to finish the outfit, y’know?
<thinking>It felt like… all the darkness within them was brighter than the light on the outside?
I love how much you switch it up with your outfits, <PlayerName>.
Some people just wear the same thing every day, y’know?
<haha>Sometimes I stare at them, trying to make them change.
<no>I guess some people just aren't programmed that way.
<yes>I heard about the mines deep underground.
<glee>Way down deep, and dark.
They still <Shift> so they’re constantly changing.
<thinking>It’d be a really great place to hide something, y’know?
<shy>If you needed one, I mean.
<worried>I had the weirdest feeling yesterday. I’m so glad to see you’re still with us, <PlayerName>.
I’m pretty sure you’re going to be fine now, y’know?
<thinking>Y'know, I never really understood how everything went South.
<thinking>Maybe we just needed a reason to start all over again?
<thinking>I’ve thought about putting a little bit more life into my fabrics...
<no>I just can’t find a way of ethically sourcing the materials for that though, y’know?
I’m so glad I’ve met you, <PlayerName>.
<shy>I feel like my life has totally turned around since meeting you, y’know?
<shy>I hope I’ve made you feel that way too.
Another great day where I get to talk to <PlayerName>.
I always enjoy our chats, <PlayerName>.
I enjoy chatting with all my good friends, y’know?
Do you think that maybe the universe had always intended for us to meet each other, <PlayerName>?
<thinking>Like there is some kind of background force pushing us together?
I just feel like we’re very good friends, y’know?
<haha>It’s kinda scary how good friends we’ve become, right?
Last night I had a weird dream that you were being controlled by someone, <PlayerName>.
<no>They had a window where they could look through it and make you move.
<worried>It was really creepy, y’know?
Hey <PlayerName>, thank you for always being there to help me out when I need something done.
<shy>I don’t think you know how much you have done for me..
<shy>So I just wanted to say thank you, y’know?
Sometimes it feels like we’re being watched, y’know?
<thinking>Like there is someone listening to our conversation right now.
Do you ever get that feeling?
<pumped>When you feel that creative spark, you have to grab onto it tightly.
<no>Whatever you do... don’t let it escape.
<pumped>Hold onto that energy as long as you can and use it for something really special.
You never know how long you've got, y'know?
Does it ever feel like I repeat myself too much?
Like I’m saying the same thing twice?
Not at all.
Sometimes.
Maybe?
Oh, that’s a relief, y’know?
<no>I’d hate to be predictable.
I feel that too!
It’s like I have to follow a script sometimes?
<yes>At least I got the part though, y’know?
That’s not a confident answer at all!
What a weird answer to choose, y’know?
<haha>Don’t worry though, we’re still friends, <PlayerName>.
<IslandName> has a lot of potential, y’know.
<yes>Even though it’s still in the early stages, I feel like the future is bright for us here.
<glee>Keep up the good work, <PlayerName>.
<IslandName> is really starting to shape up.
<yes>I can feel the energy coming from everyone, y’know?
<proud>This is starting to be a great settlement!
<IslandName> is looking incredible!
<no>I can’t believe how far it’s come, y’know?
<glee>You should be really proud of what you have done here, <PlayerName>.
<IslandName> is the best place on earth, y’know?
<no>To think, this place started as a bunch of tents.
I’m so glad you convinced me to move here, <PlayerName>.
<glee>Like I said, <IslandName> is the best place on earth!
I see you eyeing my <Kite> <PlayerName>.
<proud>Yes, I did use my own special fabric.
<glee>Thanks for noticing!
Now I need to go chase down some <PaperLanterns>.
<SkyFest> is a day to be enjoyed, okay <PlayerName>?
<yes>I worked hard to help make this <Aurora> happen.
So I’d be bummed out if you didn’t enjoy it, y’know?
<no>Oh, no, no, no, <PlayerName>.
<no>No need to thank me.
<yes>This <Aurora> is for everyone.
I simply knew how to make it happen, y’know?
Sure is pretty, right?
I made my <Kite> last night, y’know?
I just work better when it’s late.
<no>There is less noise to distract me, y’know.
<glee>That way I can hear the voices better.
It feels just right for you,
The colour is very powerful, y'know?
It will open your chakras, y'know?
Do you feel the energy coming from it?
I feel good things coming to whoever buys it.
The design just came to me, y'know?
Y'know, that would look great on you,
I put a lot of myself into this one.
Hey, <PlayerName>.
Y'know, I’ve been wondering, why did you decide to leave <SouthCity>?
It was terrible there!
I needed a change
There was nothing there for me.
Crikey, I’m glad someone said it!
Although, it’s a bit more common to hear that around here on <IslandName>.
<no>There’s nothing there for people like us.
I understand. I really do.
<shy>Sometimes you need a big shift in life like that to rearrange your life.
<yes>Get things rolling in a different direction, y’know?
<yes>I know exactly what you mean.
People like that have a powerful aura about us, y’know?
<proud>I left <SouthCity> because no one could handle my fashion.
<no>Feels like everyone there is happy wearing grey all day long.
I want my clothes to carry a bit of my energy, y’know?
I guess I like to think that everything I make contains a part of me, and I’m passing that energy onto whoever wears it.
<no>My family was mortified when I told them I wanted to be a <Nomad>.
They’re just locked into their grey ways, y’know?
<SouthCity> does that to people..
It’s like the city puts people under a spell that makes them lame for life.
<glee>I’m just glad we got away from that place, right, <PlayerName>?
Hey <PlayerName>. Do you believe in magic?
<yes>You see, I didn’t believe myself until I came across an old book in the <SouthCity> library...
<thinking>This book describes an energy that runs through us all, y’know?
<pumped>An energy that makes up everything in our world.
You can kind of feel it, a kind of rhythm playing in everything.
I feel like it's close to a C-Sharp.
Anyway, I’ve been trying to harness that energy ever since I left <SouthCity>.
<thinking>It’s definitely easier to feel here on <IslandName>...
<shy>I’m starting to sound crazy, aren’t I?
Well, thanks for listening to me talk for a bit, <PlayerName>.
